Serialized Form

  • Package gate.creole.boilerpipe

    • Class gate.creole.boilerpipe.BoilerPipe extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      5086217897382197476L

      • Serialized Fields

        • tokenIndex

          int tokenIndex
          A counter so we can keep track of which tokens we have looked at all ready. This is for efficiency reasons as we never need to look at old tokens again but removing them from the list would be time consuming

        • anchorIndex

          int anchorIndex
          A counter so we can keep track of which anchor tags we have looked at all ready. This is for efficiency reasons as we never need to look at old anchors again but removing them from the list would be time consuming

        • extractor

          Extractor extractor

        • behaviour

          Behaviour behaviour
